title: Mutual Credit System on Ergo
summary: The document discusses the implementation of a mutual credit system on the Ergo blockchain. A mutual credit system is an alternative currency system where participants issue and manage IOUs collectively, allowing for a flexible and decentralized form of trade. Ergo's technology can be used to create a trustless and collateralized mutual credit system. One way to implement this is by combining it with ErgoFund, a decentralized crowdfunding platform, where the collected funds can be used to open credit lines in the mutual credit system. This creates a self-sustaining economy within the mutual credit system.

qa_pairs.question: What is a mutual credit system?
qa_pairs.answer: A mutual credit system is a type of alternative currency system in which the currency used is not a commodity but an accounting unit, where credit is given by all participants through a system of IOUs that are issued and managed collectively by the community.

qa_pairs.question: How can Ergo's technology be used to implement a global mutual credit system?
qa_pairs.answer: Ergo's technology can be utilized to implement a global mutual credit system that is trustless and collateralized, meaning it does not rely on the trustworthiness of individual participants and is backed by collateral to prevent default.

qa_pairs.answer: Funds collected through ErgoFund, a decentralized crowdfunding platform on the Ergo blockchain, can be used to open a credit line in the mutual credit system, allowing participants to spend money for services within the mutual credit system and creating a self-sustaining economy.

sections.heading: Mutual Credit System on Ergo
sections.content:
A mutual credit system is a type of alternative currency system in which the currency used is not a commodity but an accounting unit. In this system, credit is given by all participants, through a system of IOUs that are issued and managed collectively by the community. This system allows for a flexible, decentralized form of trade, where value is not tied to a physical commodity but to the trust and cooperation of the community.

Ergo's technology can be utilized to implement a global mutual credit system. This system would be trustless and collateralized, meaning that it does not rely on the trustworthiness of individual participants and is backed by collateral to prevent default.

One way to implement this on Ergo is by combining it with ErgoFund. ErgoFund is a decentralized crowdfunding platform on the Ergo blockchain. Funds collected through ErgoFund can be used to open a credit line in the mutual credit system. This allows participants to spend money for services within the mutual credit system, creating a self-sustaining economy.

For more information on how this can be implemented, refer to the following resources:

- [Discussion on combining global mutual credit system with ErgoFund](https://discord.com/channels/668903786361651200/669143871758008321/850130154948919336)
- [Trustless Local Exchange Trading Systems (LETS) on Ergo](https://ergoplatform.org/en/blog/2019_05_29-exchange/)
